properties.address: Highway Community Centre, Penryn, Cornwall Tr10 8DA
properties.description: Warm and friendly, with great children facilities, we are partnering with Penryn and Falmouth Foodbank to provide a Warm space.
properties.title: Dwell Cafe at HighwayChurch

properties.address: The Salvation Army, Cornwall TR11 3RJ
properties.description: Here we serve free food, tea and coffee. There is also advice available from Salvation Army employees and other services.
properties.title: Falmouth Drop In

properties.address: Municipal Building, Cornwall TR11 2RT
properties.description: Housed in the Passmore Edwards Municipal Building on the Moor, the Library on the ground floor and Art Gallery on the first floor offer a warm welcoming space 6 days a week, Monday - Saturday (Opening hours vary - times advertised are for library, Art Gallery hours are as follows: Mon, Tues, Thurs Fri, Sat: 10-4; Wednesday: 10-1).
properties.title: Falmouth Library and Art Gallery

properties.address: Victoria Park, Cornwall TR15 2JF
properties.description: Warm classroom space and community led cafe. Find us opposite the kids playground, through the gated community garden.
properties.title: Food troops community kitchen and garden

properties.address: the resource office , Cornwall Tr11 2pr
properties.description: Space open to all and pets. We are also a pet food bank and help support people who are struggling and needing a warm space.
properties.title: Pawsitive Pets

properties.address: Pendennis Community Centre, Falmouth, Cornwall TR11 4NG
properties.description: We are 100% volunteer powered and led and everyone is welcome. Our community cafe is open to all and you don't have to spend money to sit here, keep warm and use the wifi. We also offer a wide range of fitness and wellbeing activities which you can join.
properties.title: Pendennis Community Centre

properties.address: Princess Pavilion, Cornwall TR11 4AR
properties.description: Space is a welcoming place for all.
properties.title: Princess Pavilion

properties.address: Middletons Row, Redruth, Cornwall TR15 1NH
properties.description: Wednesdays 10am-1pm we have a drop in with free refreshments and bacon butties. On Friday mornings 10am-12pm we have a wellbeing drop in with free refreshments. Both are an opportunity to make friends whilst keeping warm.
properties.title: Redruth Salvation Army

properties.address: Portscatho United Church, Portscatho, Cornwall TR2 5HN
properties.description: Small and welcoming Chapel just yards from the coastal path at Portscatho.
properties.title: The Retreat @ Portscatho United Church
